featuresSection.heading: Diverse Options for Flat For Rent in Sector 113 Addressing Every Lifestyle Need
description: Sector 113 provides a wide spectrum of rental properties designed to accommodate various family sizes and financial plans. From compact, efficient studio apartments to expansive luxury flats, the area is well-equipped with modern residential complexes that ensure comfort and security.

Understanding the local market dynamics is crucial. We categorize the most popular flat sizes available for rent in Sector 113 Gurugram to help you make an informed decision. Each category offers unique benefits in terms of space utilization, rental cost, and overall lifestyle fit. Review the options below and connect with our specialists to narrow down the search for your perfect rental.

features.title: 1 BHK Rental Flats
features.description: Ideal for single professionals, students, or couples starting out. These flats offer efficient space planning including a bedroom, living area, kitchen, and bathroom. A 1 BHK flat for rent in Sector 113 is often the most budget-friendly option while still providing access to community amenities like security and parking. They are typically located in complexes that prioritize easy access to public transport and local markets, simplifying daily life in Gurugram. Secure a comfortable and private living space today.

features.title: 2 BHK Rental Apartments
features.description: The most sought-after configuration for small families or working professionals sharing accommodation. A 2 BHK flat offers flexibility with two separate bedrooms, allowing for a guest room or a home office setup. Rental properties of this size in Sector 113 strike an excellent balance between spaciousness and affordability. These units generally feature modern fittings, balconies, and access to shared recreational facilities, enhancing the overall quality of rental life in Gurugram's growing suburbs.

features.title: 3 BHK Premium Rental Homes
features.description: Perfect for larger families needing substantial living space and comfort. A 3 BHK flat for rent provides ample room for privacy, dedicated storage, and larger living and dining areas suitable for entertaining guests. Many premium 3 BHK listings in Sector 113 are found in gated societies offering top-tier amenities such as swimming pools, gyms, and landscaped gardens. This choice represents a commitment to high-quality, long-term residential living with maximum convenience near major connectivity routes.

features.title: Studio Apartments
features.description: A niche but growing market for individuals who prioritize minimalism and location. Studio apartments merge the living, sleeping, and kitchen spaces into a single efficient area, separate only by a dedicated bathroom. These units are highly economical and generally located close to commercial centers in Gurugram, minimizing commute times. Renting a studio in Sector 113 offers a lock-and-leave lifestyle, perfect for frequent travellers or those with demanding work schedules who require simplicity and low maintenance.

features.title: Furnished Rental Options
features.description: For renters who need immediate move-in without the hassle of purchasing and transporting furniture, furnished flats are the optimal solution. These units come equipped with essential appliances, beds, wardrobes, and modular kitchens. While the rent might be slightly higher, the savings in time and initial investment are significant. Our listings for furnished flats for rent in Sector 113 cater particularly to corporate leases and expatriates seeking instant, high-standard living solutions in Gurugram.

features.title: Semi-Furnished Flats
features.description: Offering a middle ground, semi-furnished rental flats usually include fixed fixtures like light fittings, fans, curtains rods, and essential kitchen cabinetry. This allows tenants the flexibility to personalize the space with their own movable furniture while benefiting from some foundational amenities already being in place. Sector 113 has a large inventory of semi-furnished flats, appealing to those who plan a longer stay and want to blend convenience with customization.

faqSection.title: Common Questions About Finding a Flat For Rent in Sector 113 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get detailed answers to the most frequent queries regarding rental availability, lease terms, and local living standards in this key locality.

faqs.question: What is the typical rental range for a 2 BHK Flat For Rent in Sector 113
faqs.answer: The rental price for a 2 BHK flat in Sector 113 Gurugram varies significantly based on several factors, including the age of the building, whether it is semi-furnished or fully furnished, and the specific society amenities. Generally, you can expect the monthly rent for a standard 2 BHK to range from INR 14,000 to INR 22,000. Premium or brand-new properties in high-end complexes might command higher rents, often including covered parking and advanced security features. Always confirm the final rate and included maintenance charges before signing the lease.

faqs.question: Are security deposits standard when renting a flat in Sector 113 and what is the typical amount
faqs.answer: Yes, security deposits are standard practice across all residential rentals in Sector 113. The typical amount requested by landlords is equivalent to two months' rent, though in some instances, especially for furnished or high-value flats, it may extend up to three months' rent. This deposit is refundable at the end of the tenancy, subject to a property inspection for damages beyond normal wear and tear. Ensure this term is clearly documented in your rental agreement.

faqs.question: How good is the connectivity from Sector 113 to major commercial areas of Gurugram and Gurgaon
faqs.answer: Sector 113 boasts excellent connectivity due to its proximity to the main Bypass Road and major national highways. It allows for quick access to key commercial and industrial areas within Gurugram, such as Sector 80 and Neharpar. Furthermore, connectivity to the greater NCR region, including Gurgaon and Noida, is streamlined through well-maintained road networks, making the commute manageable for working professionals. Public transport options, including auto-rickshaws and bus services, are readily available.

faqs.question: Are there good options for fully furnished flats for rent in Sector 113 or mostly unfurnished
faqs.answer: While the market for unfurnished or semi-furnished flats is the largest, Sector 113 is increasingly seeing an inventory of high-quality fully furnished rental flats, primarily catering to corporate tenants and non-local residents seeking convenience. Fully furnished units include everything from basic furniture to essential appliances. Availability depends on the specific building and current market demand, but we maintain listings for all types to match your preference.

faqs.question: What is the typical lease duration for a rental agreement in Sector 113 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The most common and standard lease duration for rental flats in Sector 113 is 11 months. This structure is often preferred as it simplifies renewal processes and avoids complex registration requirements associated with leases exceeding one year. Longer lease terms, such as 18 or 24 months, are possible but less common and are subject to negotiation with the individual landlord and often involve registered agreements.

faqs.question: What utility and maintenance costs should I anticipate when renting a flat here
faqs.answer: Beyond the monthly rent, tenants in Sector 113 should budget for several utility and maintenance costs. These typically include electricity charges based on consumption, water charges (which may be included in society maintenance or billed separately), and gas/LPG costs. Society maintenance fees, covering common area cleaning, lift operation, and security, can range from INR 1,500 to INR 3,500 monthly, depending on the amenities provided by the specific residential complex.

faqs.question: Are pets generally allowed in rental flats in Sector 113 societies
faqs.answer: Pet policies are strictly determined by the individual housing society or the specific landlord. While some modern societies in Sector 113 are pet-friendly, many maintain a 'no-pet' policy, especially in apartment buildings where common space usage is high. It is absolutely crucial to confirm the pet policy before viewing or finalizing any Flat For Rent in Sector 113 to avoid future disputes. We can help filter listings specifically for pet-friendly properties.

faqs.question: What are the common amenities provided in Sector 113 rental societies
faqs.answer: Most premium and newer rental societies in Sector 113 offer a range of modern amenities to enhance residential life. These typically include 24/7 security services, dedicated parking spaces, full power backup for common areas, high-speed lift access, and internal maintenance teams. Additional facilities often include children's play areas, small gyms, and landscaped gardens. Higher-end properties might also feature clubhouses and swimming pools.

faqs.question: Is it better to hire a real estate agent to find a Flat For Rent in Sector 113
faqs.answer: Hiring a professional real estate agent is highly recommended for securing a Flat For Rent in Sector 113. An agent provides access to verified listings, negotiates effectively on your behalf, and manages all the complex legal documentation and move-in logistics. They save you time and protect you from potential legal or financial issues by ensuring all transactions are transparent and compliant with local laws, making the small brokerage fee a worthwhile investment.

faqs.question: How quickly can I move into a rented flat after finalizing the agreement in Sector 113
faqs.answer: The move-in timeline depends on whether the flat is immediately ready for possession. Generally, once the terms are finalized, the agreement is signed, and the security deposit and first month's rent are transferred, move-in can occur within 3 to 7 days. This period allows for final cleaning, minor touch-ups, and the completion of society registration formalities necessary for access. Fully furnished flats often allow for quicker possession than unfurnished ones requiring shifting.
